title: TheCryptoAlpha
author: TheCryptoAlpha
content: We are a DeFI Project launching on the FTM network - We are looking to add and expand our already quickly growing team. Please join our team and contact us to speak on this topic further. We are looking for all sorts of help, from developers, to community managers, to shillers, and people that can add value to our project. We pay in USD and native tokens + bonuses!

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I'm available to offer content, growth and marketing. Hit me up on Telegram:@SMMarketers

comments.author: dammyzee1
comments.body: Hello, I would be interested in working with you on your defi project. My telegram username: @Dammyzee1

comments.author: Aljay7
comments.body: I can help you on managing the community. Contact me on telegram: @Aljecoso
